title: Fed's Flow of Funds: Household Net Worth Increased $6.1 Trillion in Q3
full_text: Fed's Flow of Funds: Household Net Worth Increased $6.1 Trillion in Q3. The Federal Reserve released the Q3 2025 Flow of Funds report today: Financial Accounts of the United States .
